resources.string: Let’s connect your %1$s to your Wi-Fi so you can enjoy all features enabled by the app.
Tip: For successful Wi-Fi connection, position your %1$s within reach of your router.\nObstacles such walls may affect the Wi-Fi performance.
We recommend that you use your home Wi-Fi network nearest to the %1$s.\n\nYour %2$s does not support 5Ghz Wi-Fi networks.
Do you want to connect your %1$s to this %2$s?
2. Make sure your device is powered on.
Press the power button on your %1$s to start it.
This might take a few seconds. You will be automatically redirected when finished.

Please try the following:

1. Enable Wi-Fi on your phone.

2. Make sure your phone and your %1$s are in the same room during setup.

3. Enable setup mode on the device.
Do you need help enabling setup mode?
To find %1$s’s PHILIPS Setup Wi-Fi network, we need permission to access your location.
If your Wi-Fi network is not password protected, tap connect
You can give your %1$s any name or keep the default name.
Your %1$s is now connected to your home Wi-Fi network and paired with your phone.

Please read all 4 steps before leaving the application.
1. Tap WiFi in your phone Settings
2. Make sure your WiFi is turned on 
3. Select your home network
4. Return to the %1$s

The phone could not detect your Somneo in Home WiFi.
This may be because you entered the wrong password or because your Somneo is out of range.

Please verify your password, move your device and phone closer to your home router and try again.

If problems persist,please click the "different issue" link below.
Are you sure you want to cancel setup?
If you cancel your setup now, you will not be able to control your %1$s using your app.
GPS is disabled.You need to enable location services to complete the pairing. Then press back to return to the app.

The phone could not detect %1$s in home Wi-Fi

This may be because:
1) You entered the wrong password
2) Your %1$s is out of range

Please verify your password, move your %1$s and phone close to %2$s router and try again. If you have another router or network, you can try use those.\n\nNote: Your %1$s does not support 5Ghz networks.

Your phone has connected to a different network. 

Please reconnect your phone to %1$s.
Please read all the 4 steps before leaving the application.
1. Tap Wi-Fi in your phone settings 
2. Make sure your Wi-Fi is turned on 
3. Select the %2$s network
4. Return to the %3$s app
Enable the setup mode on the device.
Enable the setup mode on the device. This text needs to be configured by the proposition.
Usually you can setup the device in this state. This text needs to be configured by the proposition.
Accidentally connect with the wrong phone?
If your device has been connected to another phone by accident, you may see this screen prematurely.
Establishing connection between %1$s and home network
This might take up to 60 seconds. You will be automatically redirected when finished.
